content: You are Giacomo. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Antonio., Antonio just said to you: '"Ah, Giacomo! Excellent work with that wage payment. Much appreciated."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"Prego, Antonio! Glad to be of service. Just doing my duty."

You are Giacomo. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Antonio., Antonio just said to you: '"Grazie, Giacomo. Much appreciated, that's a relief."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"Prego, Antonio. Glad to be of assistance."
